title: Visit Stunning and Amazing Corners of Leh and Ladakh (aspen adventures)
text: By aspen adventures Aug 1, 2015 Leh Ladakh is one of the favorite places of those who love to visit stunning corners and exotic places of the world. Leh and Ladakh are the places where thousands of visitors enjoy every year. It is a marvelous place that is amazingly sandwiched between the beautiful Himalayas and awesome Karakoram range. These places are famous as the coldest places where one will definitely love to see lush green fields, shimmering and beautiful rivers and panoramic views. Know about the must watch places in Leh and Ladakh - Hemis Monastery - It is a Tibetan Buddhist Monastery located in the Hemis town of the beautiful place Ladakh. Visitors will get the ample opportunity to see the cultures and adventure at this place in Hemis festival. In the month of June, Hemis festival is arranged in the monastery complex and lots of people visit this place in the month of June to see this amazing festival. The beautiful statues and eye catching paintings are also the main attraction of this place and best place for those who love the creative work. Leh - Leh is the most famous and largest city of Ladakh. It is the starting point for those who visit the Ladakh Bike Trip to see the wonderful places and scenes. It is a beautiful place that is famous for its beautiful sights. People feel that they are in the lap of nature because of the beauty and peace of this place. Leh is the most favorite place and actually the paradise for the adventure lovers who are highly enthusiastic and love hiking. For trekking lovers, snow covered mountains offer them to feel a different type of experience that they never forget. Some people also like this place for the white water rafting. All these activities are thrilling, but the best experience of the life.Nubra Valley - Nubra Valley is the valley of flowers, where so many beautiful flowers can be found. The beautiful flowers along with the beauty of snow capped mountains enhance the beauty of this place. Adventure seeker people love to visit this place almost every year.To visit all these places and enjoy all of them perfectly, must take Leh Ladakh Tour Packages. Visit the websites or companies those offer Leh Ladakh Tour packages and find the best one as per the requirement and budget and make the whole trip systematic, comfortable and unforgettable. About the Author We provide Ladakh Bike Trip tour packages for all generations. You see here natural beauty of mountain and Leh Ladakh... Rating:
